items.summary: Replace the header logo with the uploaded image 4_20240410_121533_0002.png showing 'Skills Bazzar' branding. Update the Header component to display this logo image instead of the current 'Evergreen Hub' text logo.

Create a PaymentGateway component displaying India Post Payment Bank transfer details: Account Number 009910265673, Bank Name 'India Post Payment Bank', IFSC Code IPOS0000001, Account Holder Name 'Rudra Pratap Singh'. Include a prominent section explaining the manual bank transfer payment process.

Create a payment proof submission form allowing users to enter transaction ID and upload payment screenshot after making a bank transfer. This form should appear after a user clicks 'Buy Now' on any package card.
Update the PricingSection 'Buy Now' buttons to open a payment modal showing the PaymentGateway bank details and payment proof submission form instead of directly linking to WhatsApp.

Implement backend functionality to store payment proof submissions including userId, packageId, transactionId, screenshot blob data, and status (initially 'pending'). This leverages the existing Payment model and blob storage capabilities.
